Why do I hear the audio 4 seconds late?

This happens due to browser buffering and depends on the browser used.

Try these solutions:

  • Use Flash renderer. It's designed for reduced lag.
  • Use Firefox and Opus audio. Opus is the next-gen low-latency low-bandwidth codec audio streaming codec and Firefox does little buffering of it.
  • Use VLC Media Player. In it's menu, open Media ⇨ Open Network Stream, enter http://your-ip:your-port/audio.wav as the URL, click "Show more options" and set buffering to 1 ms.

Tasker events control

Tasker is an automation solution for Android smartphones. It can help you, for example, send an SMS or change ringer volume based on your location or by the schedule.

IP Webcam Pro can generate Tasker events, either with web interface or with customizable UI.

To configure Tasker for using IP Webcam events, create a new Profile using "+" button and select State ⇨ Plugin ⇨ IP Webcam as a trigger.

Events generated from web interface have the same event name as the button text. For example, the central button generates the event named "5".

Why do I hear the audio 4 seconds late?

This happens due to browser buffering and depends on the browser used.

Try these solutions:

  • Use Flash renderer. It's designed for reduced lag.
  • Use Firefox and Opus audio. Opus is the next-gen low-latency low-bandwidth codec audio streaming codec and Firefox does little buffering of it.
  • Use VLC Media Player. In it's menu, open Media ⇨ Open Network Stream, enter http://your-ip:your-port/audio.wav as the URL, click "Show more options" and set buffering to 1 ms.

Tasker events control

Tasker is an automation solution for Android smartphones. It can help you, for example, send an SMS or change ringer volume based on your location or by the schedule.

IP Webcam Pro can generate Tasker events, either with web interface or with customizable UI.

To configure Tasker for using IP Webcam events, create a new Profile using "+" button and select State ⇨ Plugin ⇨ IP Webcam as a trigger.

Events generated from web interface have the same event name as the button text. For example, the central button generates the event named "5".

Perché sento l’audio 4 secondi in ritardo?

Questo accade a causa del browser buffering e dipende dal browser utilizzato.

Prova le seguenti soluzioni:

  • Usa renderer Flash. È progettato per un ritardo ridotto.
  • Utilizzare Firefox e Opus audio. Opus è il next-gen a bassa latenza bassa larghezza di banda con codec audio streaming e Firefox fa poco buffer di esso.
  • Usare VLC Media Player. Nel menù, aprire Media ⇨ Open Network Stream, immettere http://tuo-ip:tuo-port/audio.wav come URL, fare clic su "Mostra più opzioni" e impostare il buffering a 1 ms.

Tasker controllo eventi

Tasker è una soluzione di automazione per gli smartphone Android. Egli può, per esempio, inviare un SMS o variare il volume della suoneria in base alla tua esigenza o alla preventiva pianificazione.

IP Webcam Pro può generare eventi Tasker, sia con interfaccia web o con interfaccia utente personalizzabile.

Per configurare Tasker per l'utilizzo di eventi IP Webcam, creare un nuovo profilo utilizzando il pulsante "+" e selezionare Stato ⇨ Plugin ⇨ IP Webcam come trigger.

Eventi generati da interfaccia web hanno lo stesso nome di evento come il testo del pulsante. Ad esempio, il tasto centrale genera l'evento denominato "5".

왜 4초후에 오디오가 들리는가?

이것은 사용하는 브라우저의 종류와 버퍼링 때문에 발생합니다.

해결방법:

  • 플래쉬 렌더러를 사용. 이것은 지연방지를 위해 만들어진 것임.
  • 파이어폭스와 Opus 오디오를 사용. Opus 는 적은 지연과 밴드폭을 사용하는 오디오 스트리밍 코덱임. 파이어폭스는 적은 버퍼링을 사용함.
  • VLC 미디어 플레이어를 사용. 메뉴에서 Media ⇨ 네트워크 스트림 열기에서 http://your-ip:your-port/audio.wav 로 열고, "고급설정" 으로 들어가서 버퍼링을 1mS 로 설정함.

태스크 이벤트 제어

Tasker는 안드로이드 스마트폰을 위한 자동화 솔루션입니다. 문자를 보내거나 위치에 따라 착신벨소리를 바꾸거나 스케쥴에 따라 움직이게 해 줍니다.

IP Webcam Pro 버젼은 사용자 정의 UI 웹인터페이스나 태스커 이벤트를 만들 수 있습니다.

IP Webcam 이벤트를 사용해서 태스커를 설정하려면 "+" 버튼을 눌러 새 프로파일을 만들고, 상태 ⇨ 플러그인 ⇨ IP Webcam 트리거를 선택하세요.

웹인터페이스에서 만들어진 이벤트는 버튼텍스트와 같은 이벤트 이름을 가집니다. 예를 들면 가운데 버튼은 "5" 번 이벤트로 만들어 집니다.

카메라 상태를 읽어올 수 없음! 몇가지 기능이 동작하지 않음 .

http.title: Android Webcam Server
http.html:
Android webcam server

You can view your camera in several ways:

  • Open stream in media player, such as VLC
  • Open remote control panel for use with mediaplayers and third-party software
  • Use java browser plugin
  • Use javascript to update frames in browser, for IE, Playstation and Wii. Use, if your browser do not support MJPG natively
  • Use browser built-in viewer (not supported by some browsers)
  • Use tinyCam Monitor on another Android device
  • Use IP Cam Viewer on another Android device (external link)
  • Connect to PC for use with Skype and other videochats on Windows
  • Connect to PC for use with Skype and other videochats on Ubuntu GNU/Linux (external link)
  • Take full-resolution photo without or with autofocus (put phone into a silent mode to prevent shutter sound)
  • Download immediate video frame

Third-party software support:

  • URL for MJPG-compatible software: http://192.168.5.91:8080/videofeed
  • URL for software that supports JPEG frames (slower, less secure): http://192.168.5.91:8080/shot.jpg
  • URL for audio streaming: http://192.168.5.91:8080/audio.wav
  • URL for full-resolution photo capture: http://192.168.5.91:8080/photo.jpg
  • URL for full-resolution photo capture (with autofocus): http://192.168.5.91:8080/photoaf.jpg
  • URL for compressed audio stream, use for auido-only recording: http://192.168.5.91:8080/audio.ogg

Звук запаздывает на 4 секунды?

Это происходит из-за внутренней буфферизации браузера.

Попробуйте эти решения:

  • Используйте встроенный проигрыватель Flash. Он сделан для уменьшения запоздания.
  • Используйте браузер Firefox и проигрыватель Opus. Opus -- высококачественный кодек следующего поколения, разработанный для низкой латентности и маленького размера. Firefox почти не буфферизирует его.
  • Прослушивайте аудио через VLC Media Player. В его меню выберите Медиа ⇨ Открыть сетевой поток, выберите http://ваш-ip:ваш-порт/audio.wav как URL, выберите "Показывать больше настроек" и установите буферизацию в 1 мс.

События Tasker

Tasker -- система автоматизации смартфонов на Android. Она может автоматизировать, скажем, отправку SMS или менять громкость звонка по расписанию или по местоположению.

IP Webcam Pro может генерировать события для Tasker, либо через веб-интерфейс или через редактируемый интерфейс.

Чтобы настроить Tasker для работы с событиями и состояниями IP Webcam, создайте в Tasker профиль, нажав кнопку "+" и выбрав State ⇨ Plugin ⇨ IP Webcam как условие.

События, сгенерированные из веб-интерфейса, имеют то же имя, что написано на кнопке. Скажем, центральная генерирует событие с именем "5".

Why do I hear the audio 4 seconds late?

This happens due to browser buffering and depends on the browser used.

Try these solutions:

  • Use Flash renderer. It's designed for reduced lag.
  • Use Firefox and Opus audio. Opus is the next-gen low-latency low-bandwidth codec audio streaming codec and Firefox does little buffering of it.
  • Use VLC Media Player. In it's menu, open Media ⇨ Open Network Stream, enter http://your-ip:your-port/audio.wav as the URL, click "Show more options" and set buffering to 1 ms.

Tasker events control

Tasker is an automation solution for Android smartphones. It can help you, for example, send an SMS or change ringer volume based on your location or by the schedule.

IP Webcam Pro can generate Tasker events, either with web interface or with customizable UI.

To configure Tasker for using IP Webcam events, create a new Profile using "+" button and select State ⇨ Plugin ⇨ IP Webcam as a trigger.

Events generated from web interface have the same event name as the button text. For example, the central button generates the event named "5".

Warum hört man den Ton 4 Sekunden später?

Das passiert wegen des Buffering vom Browser und hängt vom jeweiligem Browser ab.

Versuchen Sie diese Lösungen:

  • Benutze den Flash Renderer. Flash Renderer ist designed für reduzierte Zeitdifferenz.
  • Benutze Firefox mit Opus audio. Opus ist die next-gen low-latency low-bandwidth codec audio streaming codec und Firefox macht nur wenig Buffering.

  • Benutze VLC Media Player. Im Menu, öffne Media ⇨ Open Network Stream, tippe http://your-ip:your-port/audio.wav als URL, klicke "Show more options"

    und setze das Buffering auf 1 ms.

Tasker Ereignisse Kontrolle

Tasker ist eine Automationssoftware für Android Smartphones. Es hilft ihnen zum Beispiel, ein SMS zu senden oder die Ruftonlautstärke zu ändern, je nach GPS Positionb oder Zeitplan.

IP Webcam Pro kann sogenannte Tasker Ereignisse generieren, entweder via Webinterface oder mit einem anpassbarem Benutzerinterface.

Um den Tasker für IP Webcam Ereignisse zu konfigurieren, kreiere ein neues Profil mit dem "+" Kopf und wähle State ⇨ Plugin ⇨ IP Webcam als Trigger.

Ereignisse welche via Webinterface erstellt werden, haben den gleichen Ereignisnamen wie die Shclatflächenbeschriftung.

Why do I hear the audio 4 seconds late?

This happens due to browser buffering and depends on the browser used.

Try these solutions:

  • Use Flash renderer. It's designed for reduced lag.
  • Use Firefox and Opus audio. Opus is the next-gen low-latency low-bandwidth codec audio streaming codec and Firefox does little buffering of it.
  • Use VLC Media Player. In it's menu, open Media ⇨ Open Network Stream, enter http://your-ip:your-port/audio.wav as the URL, click "Show more options" and set buffering to 1 ms.

Tasker events control

Tasker is an automation solution for Android smartphones. It can help you, for example, send an SMS or change ringer volume based on your location or by the schedule.

IP Webcam Pro can generate Tasker events, either with web interface or with customizable UI.

To configure Tasker for using IP Webcam events, create a new Profile using "+" button and select State ⇨ Plugin ⇨ IP Webcam as a trigger.

Events generated from web interface have the same event name as the button text. For example, the central button generates the event named "5".

Cannot get camera status! Some of the functionality might not work because of .

Pourquoi j'entend le son 4 secondes plus tard ?

Cela est dû à la mémoire tampon du navigateur et dépend du navigateur utilisé.

Essayez ces solutions :

  • Utilisez le rendu Flash. Il est conçu pour réduire les lags.
  • Utilisez Firefox et Opus audio. Opus est la prochaine génération à faible latence et faible bande passante de codec audio en streaming et Firefox ne fait pas de mémoire tampon de lui.
  • Utilisez VLC Media Player. C'est dans son menu, ouvrez Média ⇨ Ouvrir un flux réseau, entrez http://votre-ip:votre-port/audio.wav comme URL, puis cliquez sur "Afficher plus d'optiosn" et sélectionnez "Mise en cache" et entrez 1 ms.

Tasker contrôle des événements

Tasker est une solution d'automatisation pour les smartphones Android. Il peut vous aider, par exemple, à envoyer un SMS ou de modifier le volume de la sonnerie en fonction de votre emplacement ou de l'heure.

IP Webcam Pro peut générer des évènements Tasker, soit avec l'interface Web ou avec l'interface utilisateur personnalisable.

Pour configurer Tasker pour utiliser les évènements IP Webcam, créez un nouveau profil en utilisant le bouton "+" et sélectionnez Etat ⇨ Plugin ⇨ IP Webcam comme un déclencheur.

Les événements générés à partir de l'interface web ont le même nom de l'événement que le texte du bouton. Par exemple, le bouton central génère l'événement nommé "5".

Impossible d'obtenir le statut de la caméra ! Certaines fonctionnalités pourraient ne pas fonctionner à cause de cela .

, les morceaux les plus anciens seront écrasés lorsque l'espace de stockage à atteint sa limite.

왜 4초후에 오디오가 들리는가?

이것은 사용하는 브라우저의 종류와 버퍼링 때문에 발생합니다.

해결방법:

  • 플래쉬 렌더러를 사용. 이것은 지연방지를 위해 만들어진 것임.
  • 파이어폭스와 Opus 오디오를 사용. Opus 는 적은 지연과 밴드폭을 사용하는 오디오 스트리밍 코덱임. 파이어폭스는 적은 버퍼링을 사용함.
  • VLC 미디어 플레이어를 사용. 메뉴에서 Media ⇨ 네트워크 스트림 열기에서 http://your-ip:your-port/audio.wav 로 열고, "고급설정" 으로 들어가서 버퍼링을 1mS 로 설정함.

태스크 이벤트 제어

Tasker는 안드로이드 스마트폰을 위한 자동화 솔루션입니다. 문자를 보내거나 위치에 따라 착신벨소리를 바꾸거나 스케쥴에 따라 움직이게 해 줍니다.

IP Webcam Pro 버젼은 사용자 정의 UI 웹인터페이스나 태스커 이벤트를 만들 수 있습니다.

IP Webcam 이벤트를 사용해서 태스커를 설정하려면 "+" 버튼을 눌러 새 프로파일을 만들고, 상태 ⇨ 플러그인 ⇨ IP Webcam 트리거를 선택하세요.

웹인터페이스에서 만들어진 이벤트는 버튼텍스트와 같은 이벤트 이름을 가집니다. 예를 들면 가운데 버튼은 "5" 번 이벤트로 만들어 집니다.

카메라 상태를 읽어올 수 없음! 몇가지 기능이 동작하지 않음 .
